items.name: case baseline
items.desc: Positions the text so that the font’s baseline lies on the node’s origin.

items.name: case center
items.desc: Centers the text vertically on the node’s origin.

items.name: case top
items.desc: Positions the text so that the top of the text is on the node’s origin.

items.name: case bottom
items.desc: Positions the text so that the bottom of the text is on the node’s origin.
